briefdescription.para: File containing all the simplification routines for MARTY.

detaileddescription.para: When a calculation is done (amplitude, squared amplitude or Wilson coefficient) it is simplified by the mty::simpli::simplify() method that uses directly or indirectly all the other routines in this file. The other rountines can for the most part be called separatly, but for a full successful simplification the order is extremely important and the mty::simpli::simplify() method is a reference.
